DOC.brief_summary: Purpose: to characterize the posture, tone and mobility of lips and tongue of mouth breathing children. Methods: 40 mouth breathing children, 26 (65%) male and 14 (35%) female, aging between 7 and 10 years old, were involved in this research realized in SÃ£o Paulo, SP, Brazil . It was used the MBGR protocol to evaluate the posture, tone and mobility of lips and tongue of mouth breathing children.
DOC.brief_title: Lips and Tongue of Mouth Breathing Children
DOC.criteria: Mouth breathing children diagnosed by doctor. Children with mental, neurological or hearing diseases, or with cold or flu at the examination day.
